TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CacheDependency extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 在存储于 ASP.NET 应用程序的 对象中的项与文件、缓存键、文件或缓存键的数组，或另一个 对象之间建立依赖关系。

span.span: Establishes a dependency relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a file, cache key, an array of either, or another object.

summary.span: 类监视依赖关系，以便在任何这些对象发生更改时，自动删除缓存的项。

span.span: The class monitors the dependency relationships so that when any of them changes, the cached item will be automatically removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将项添加到依赖于其他对象（如文件或文件数组）的缓存，则当对象发生更改时，将自动从缓存中删除该依赖项。If you add an item to the cache that is dependent on another object, such as a file or array of files, the dependent item is automatically removed from the cache when the object changes. 例如，假设您创建了一个基于 XML 文件中的数据的 对象。For example, suppose you create a object based on data in an XML file. 您可以使用 对象将 添加到缓存，该对象使 依赖于 XML 文件。You can add the to the cache with a object that makes the dependent on the XML file. 如果 XML 文件发生更改，则将从缓存中删除 。If the XML file changes, the is removed from the cache. 可以将具有依赖项的项添加到应用程序缓存中，并具有 和 方法。You can add items with dependencies to your application's cache with the and methods. 不能使用 属性向缓存中添加具有依赖项的项。You cannot use the property to add items to the cache with dependencies. 若要设置依赖项，请创建 类的实例，指定该项依赖的文件、键或目录，然后将该依赖项传递到 或 方法。To set up a dependency, you create an instance of the class, specifying the files, keys, or directories on which the item is dependent, and then pass the dependency to the or method. 实例可以表示一个文件或目录、一个文件或目录的数组，也可以表示一个文件或目录的数组以及一个缓存键数组（这些项表示存储在 对象中的其他项）。The instance can represent a single file or directory, an array of files or directories, or an array of files or directories along with an array of cache keys (these represent other items stored in the object). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定自上一次请求 后 是否发生了更改。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `start` 参数中传递的 `dt` 值设置为 。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要从 派生你自己的类，请实现此版本的 构造函数。If you want to derive your own class from , implement this version of the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个类，该类实现 构造函数的此版本，因为需要从 派生的所有类。The following code example is a class that implements this version of the constructor as all classes that derive from are required to. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filename) cil managed

param.name: filename
param.span: 缓存对象所依赖的文件或目录的路径。

span.span: The path to a file or directory that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 当该资源更改时，缓存的对象将过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When this resource changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视文件或目录的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在文件系统中找不到 `filename` 参数中指定的目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少目录或文件，则在创建目录或文件时，将从 中删除缓存的对象。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 类的实例，该实例具有对 XML 文件的依赖。The following code example creates an instance of the class with a dependency on an XML file. 然后 方法将一个项添加到依赖该文件的 中。The method then adds an item to the that is dependent upon that file. [!code-csharp[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 你还可以使用以下技术将项添加到 ，并对文件进行依赖。You can also use the following technique to add an item to the with a dependency on a file. [!code-csharp[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/CS/DependencySingleFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/VB/DependencySingleFilevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: filenames
param.span: 缓存对象所依赖的一组（到文件或目录的）路径。

span.span: An array of paths (to files or directories) that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 当这些资源中的任何一个更改时，缓存的对象即过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When any of these resources changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视一组（到文件或目录的）路径的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数组中的任何文件或目录发生更改或已从数组中移除，则缓存的项将过时，并将从应用程序的 对象中移除。If any of the files or directories in the array changes or is removed from the array, the cached item becomes obsolete and is removed from the application's object. 此外，如果在文件系统中找不到 `filenames` 参数中指定的任何目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少某个目录或文件，则将在创建该目录或文件时从 中删除缓存的对象。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 创建包含文件依赖项的数组时，必须定义要添加到 的项所依赖的文件数。When you create the array that contains the file dependencies, you must define the number of files that the item you are adding to the is dependent on. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将一个项添加到 ，其中包含对文件数组的依赖项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add an item to the with dependencies on an array of files. 还可以使项依赖于目录的数组。You can also make the item dependent on an array of directories. [!code-csharp[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/CS/DependencyMultiFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/VB/DependencyMultiFilevb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New (filename As String, start As DateTime)

param.name: filename
param.span: 缓存对象所依赖的文件或目录的路径。

span.span: The path to a file or directory that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 当该资源更改时，缓存的对象将过时，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When this resource changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

span.span: The time against which to check the last modified date of the directory or file.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视文件或目录的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在文件系统中找不到 `filename` 参数中指定的目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少目录或文件，则在创建目录或文件时，将从 中删除缓存的对象。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪立即开始，不会直接基于 `start` 参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用 `start` 参数将过去的日期和时间传递给你要检查在 `filename` 参数中传递的目录或文件的上次修改日期。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the directory or file passed in the `filename` parameter. 如果上次修改日期晚于在 `start` 参数中传递的日期和时间集，则会从 中删除缓存的项。If the last modified date is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数实例化一个 对象，然后使用该依赖项将一项插入到 中。The following code example uses this constructor to instantiate a object, then inserts an item into the with that dependency. `start` 参数中传递的 `dt` 值设置为 。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes and specifies a time when change monitoring begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在文件系统中找不到 `filenames` 参数中指定的任何目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。If any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少某个目录或文件，则将在创建该目录或文件时从 中删除缓存的对象。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪立即开始，不会直接基于 `start` 参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用 `start` 参数将过去的日期和时间传递给你要检查传入的数组在 `filenames` 参数中的上次修改日期。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the array passed in the `filenames` parameter. 如果数组中任何对象的上次修改日期晚于在 `start` 参数中传递的日期和时间集，则会从 中删除缓存的项。If the last modified date of any object in the array is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，该对象在 方法调用中将对象作为参数参数包含时传递两个 XML 文件和一个 值。The following code example creates a object that passes two XML files and a value when the object is included as a parameter argument in an method call. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor4/CS/depmultifilestimecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor4/VB/depmultifilestimevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: cachekeys
param.span: 一组缓存键，新对象监视它们的更改。

span.span: An array of cache keys that the new object monitors for changes.

param.span: 当这些缓存键中的任何一个发生更改时，与此依赖项对象关联的缓存对象即过时，并从缓存中移除。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视一组（到文件或目录的）路径、缓存键的更改情况或同时监视二者的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果在文件系统中找不到 `filenames` 参数中指定的任何目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少某个目录或文件，则将在创建该目录或文件时从 中删除缓存的对象。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但 `cachekeys` 依赖项的工作方式不同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果在插入时 `cachekeys` 参数中至少有一个值不存在，则插入操作将失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，此方案不会引发异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码段演示了如何将一个项插入到应用程序的 中，该项依赖于缓存中的另一项。The following code fragment demonstrates how to insert an item into your application's with a dependency on a key to another item placed in the cache. 由于此方法使用数组语法，因此必须定义要添加到 的项所依赖的键的数目。Since this method uses array syntax, you must define the number of keys on which the item you are adding to the is dependent. [!code-csharp[Key based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Key based dependency/CS/DependencyKeycs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Key based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Key based dependency/VB/DependencyKeyvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果在文件系统中找不到 `filenames` 参数中指定的任何目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少某个目录或文件，则将在创建该目录或文件时从 中删除缓存的对象。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但 `cachekeys` 依赖项的工作方式不同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果在插入时 `cachekeys` 参数中至少有一个值不存在，则插入操作将失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，此方案不会引发异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪立即开始，不会直接基于 `start` 参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用 `start` 参数将过去的日期和时间传递给你要检查在 `filenames` 或 `cachekeys` 参数中传递的任何对象的上次修改日期。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any object passed in the `filenames` or `cachekeys` parameters. 如果任何这些对象的上次修改日期晚于在 `start` 参数中传递的日期和时间集，则会从 中删除缓存的项。If the last modified date of any of those objects is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 `CreateDependency` 方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 调用此方法时，它将创建一个 对象，并使用 属性将一个项添加到缓存，`key` 参数 `key1`，值为 `Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 然后，将使用 `key1` 的值创建字符串 `dependencyKey`的数组。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 然后，此 构造函数实例化一个 对象，该对象将 `dependencyKey` 和 对象作为参数参数进行传递。This constructor then instantiates a object that passes `dependencyKey` and the object as parameter arguments. 接下来，使用 对象作为参数来调用 方法。The method is called next, using the object as a parameter. 这将使用依赖于 `key1` 键的 方法，将对象添加到缓存中。This makes the object added to the cache using the method dependent on the `key1` key. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor6/CS/depkeytimecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor6/VB/depkeytimevb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 此实例所依赖的 类的另一个实例。

span.span: Another instance of the class that this instance is dependent upon.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它监视一组（到文件或目录的）路径、缓存键的更改情况或同时监视二者的更改情况。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

summary.span: 它还使自己依赖于 类的一个单独的实例。

span.span: It also makes itself dependent upon a separate instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果在文件系统中找不到 `filenames` 参数中指定的任何目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少某个目录或文件，则将在创建该目录或文件时从 中删除缓存的对象。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但 `cachekeys` 依赖项的工作方式不同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果在插入时 `cachekeys` 参数中至少有一个值不存在，则插入操作将失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，此方案不会引发异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 `CreateDependency` 方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 调用此方法时，它将使用 属性将一个项添加到缓存，其中 `key` 参数 `key1` 和值为 `Value 1`。When this method is called, it uses the property to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 然后，将使用 `key1` 的值创建字符串 `dependencyKey`的数组。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 构造函数用于创建 对象 `dep1`，该对象将 `dependencyKey` 作为参数参数进行传递。The constructor is used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 使用此构造函数创建第二个 对象 `dep2`，`dep1` 作为第三个参数参数传递。A second object, `dep2`, is created using this constructor, with `dep1` passed as the third parameter argument. 第二个依赖项依赖于第一个依赖项。This second dependency is dependent on the first. 接下来，使用第二个 对象作为参数来调用 方法。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果第一个依赖项以任何方式发生更改，则缓存的项将失效。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor7/CS/dependencycs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor7/VB/dependencyvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果在文件系统中找不到 `filenames` 参数中指定的任何目录或文件，则会将其视为缺少。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果在将具有依赖项的对象添加到 时，缺少某个目录或文件，则将在创建该目录或文件时从 中删除缓存的对象。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假设你将一个对象添加到 ，并依赖于以下文件路径： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果在创建 对象时找不到该文件，但以后创建了该对象，则会在创建 xyz .dat 文件时删除缓存的对象。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 但 `cachekeys` 依赖项的工作方式不同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果在插入时 `cachekeys` 参数中至少有一个值不存在，则插入操作将失败。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 请注意，此方案不会引发异常。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 更改跟踪立即开始，不会直接基于 `start` 参数。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用 `start` 参数将过去的日期和时间传递给你要检查在 `filenames`、`cachekeys`或 `dependency` 参数中传递的任何对象的上次修改日期。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any of the objects passed in the `filenames`, `cachekeys`, or `dependency` parameters. 如果任何这些对象的上次修改日期晚于在 `start` 参数中传递的日期和时间，则将从 中删除缓存的项。If the last modified date for any of those objects is later than the date and time passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 `CreateDependency` 方法。The following code example shows a `CreateDependency` method. 调用此方法时，它将创建一个 对象，并使用 属性将一个项添加到缓存，其中的键参数为 `key1`，值为 `Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a key parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 然后，将创建一个字符串数组 `dependencyKey`，该数组的第一个（且唯一的）索引的值设置为 `key1` 的值。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value at its first (and only) index set to the value of `key1` as well. 然后，使用 构造函数创建 对象 `dep1`，该对象将 `dependencyKey` 作为参数参数进行传递。The constructor is then used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 然后使用此构造函数创建第二个 对象 `dep2`，并使用 `dep1` 和作为参数参数传递的 对象。A second object, `dep2`, is then created using this constructor, with `dep1` and the object passed as parameter arguments. 第二个依赖项依赖于第一个依赖项，并且依赖项监视将在调用 `CreateDependency` 方法后的10秒后开始。This second dependency is dependent on the first, and dependency monitoring will begin 10 seconds after the `CreateDependency` method is called. 接下来，使用第二个 对象作为参数来调用 方法。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果第一个依赖项以任何方式发生更改，则缓存的项将失效。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor8/CS/dependencytimecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor8/VB/dependencytimevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 检索 对象的唯一标识符。

span.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.
The unique identifier for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对于跟踪与某个项或应用程序关联的 类的多个实例特别有用。This method can be particularly useful for tracking multiple instances of the class associated with an item or an application. 标识符是文件名（对于文件依赖项）或键名称（用于缓存键依赖项）和此方法分配给依赖项的字符串的组合。The identifier is a combination of either the file name (for a file dependency) or the key name (for a cache-key dependency) and a string that this method assigns to the dependency. 在从 类派生的类中，可以重写此方法以自定义它生成唯一标识符的方式。In classes that derive from the class, you can override this method to customize how it generates the unique identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `aggDep`的 对象，该对象的数组中包含两个 对象。The following code example creates an object, named `aggDep`, with two objects in its array. 实例化 `aggDep` 后，代码将调用 方法为 `aggDep` 包含的依赖项生成唯一标识符，并将标识符显示到包含页。Once `aggDep` is instantiated, the code calls the method to generate a unique identifier for both dependencies that `aggDep` contains and displays the identifiers to the containing page. 然后，使用 方法将一个项添加到 ，并将 `aggDep` 为依赖项。An item is then added to the , using the method, with `aggDep` as a dependency. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1/VB/aggregatecachedependencysamplevb.aspx#3)]

value.span: 如果 对象已更改，则为 ；否则为 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 将项添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的 。You can add an item to an ASP.NET application's with a . 当 更改时，添加到 中的项将失效，并从缓存中移除。When the changes, the item added to the is invalidated and removed from the cache. 您可以使用此属性来确定 是否已更改，并在 中重新创建项（如果已发生）。You can use this property to determine whether a has changed, and recreate the item in the if that has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定自上一次请求 后 是否发生了更改。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `start` 参数中传递的 `dt` 值设置为 。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . span.span: Notifies the base object that the dependency represented by a derived class has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的任何类都必须实现此方法。Any class that derives from the class must implement this method. 从 类派生时，将使用尚未重写的任何方法或属性的基本功能。When you derive from the class, you use the base functionality of any method or property that you have not overridden. 当你创建派生类的实例时，它表示要使缓存的项依赖的文件、缓存键、数据库表或其他任意对象。When you create an instance of the derived class, it represents the files, cache keys, database tables, or other arbitrary objects that you want to make a cached item dependent upon. 当某个依赖项发生更改时，此方法将通知 类的基本功能，该项已更改，因此可以更新 和 属性的值。When a dependency item changes, this method notifies the base functionality of the class that the item has changed, so that the values of the and properties can be updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个从 类继承的类。The following code example shows a class that inherits from the class. 它创建 `ResetDependency`的公共方法，该方法使用 方法更改依赖项的修改时间，然后调用 方法。It creates a public method, `ResetDependency`, that uses the method to change the time at which the dependency was modified, and then calls the method. [!code-vb[CacheDependency_Whidbey_Example1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency_Whidbey_Example1/VB/cachedependencysample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 允许第一个用户声明对此依赖项的独占拥有权。

span.span: Allows the first user to declare exclusive ownership of this dependency.

returns.span: 如果此项第一个获得所有权，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the item was the first to take ownership; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法声明使用了依赖项。This method declares that the dependency is used. 如果另一项以前调用过此方法并取得所有权，则返回 `false`。If another item previously called this method and took ownership, `false` is returned. 一个 只能由一个缓存条目使用。A can only be used by one cache entry. 当将某个项添加到具有指定的任何缓存依赖项的缓存时，缓存应取得这些依赖项的所有权，以确保它们不会在其他位置重复使用。When an item is added to a cache with any cache dependencies specified, the cache should take ownership of those dependencies to make sure that they are not reused somewhere else.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UtcLastModified As DateTime
public: property DateTime UtcLastModified { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取依赖项的上次更改时间。

span.span: Gets the time when the dependency was last changed.

value.span: 依赖项的上次更改时间。

span.span: The time when the dependency was last changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性以协调世界时（UTC）（也称为格林尼治标准时间）来度量。This property is measured in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also known as Greenwich Mean Time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 类将具有两个 对象依赖项的项添加到 。The following code example uses the class to add an item, with two object dependencies, to the . 对 项发出请求时，该代码将检查项是否在 中。When a request for the item is made, the code checks whether the item is in the . 如果是，则将 属性转换为字符串，并将其显示在该页上。If it is, the property is converted to a string and displayed on the page. 如果不是，则创建项及其两个依赖项并将其添加到 中。If it is not, the item and its two dependencies are created and added to the .
